original_text: I wanted to remove my people completely, so that nobody would ever remember them. I wanted to remove my people completely, so that nobody would ever remember them. I wanted to remove my people completely, so that nobody would ever remember them. I wanted to remove my people completely,
korean_text: 내가 그들을 흩어서 사람들 사이에서 그들에 대한 기억이 끊어지게 하리라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: I wanted to remove my people completely,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 백성을 완전히 없애고 싶었고,

sentences.original_text: so that nobody would ever remember them.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그들을 영원히 기억하지 못하게 하고 싶었다.
